review_data.title: Finally found the best Indian in Zurich!
review_data.content: We have been searching for SO long for the best Indian takeaway in Zürich and finally we found it! The tikka is properly marinated and the sauces are thick and creamy rather than oily like the usual Zürich standard! This is now our go-to Indian,...More

review_data.title: Bad Food Not worth your money
review_data.content: We ordered panner dish, dal, naan, tandoori roti , gulab jamun and rice. Dal was really bad. Rest of the food was just okay. We found it wayyyyyy too expensive for a very very average meal.

review_data.title: Disappointing meal but an excellent management attitude.

review_data.title: I do NOT recommend this restaurant
review_data.content: This restaurant is one of the worst Indian meals I have ever had, and I am a die-hard Indian cuisine lover who cooks it a lot at home also. Portions are tiny for the price you pay, and the curries are bland and not flavoursome......More

review_data.title: Buzzing place which are frequented by Indians
review_data.content: In close proximity to the train station you find this restaurant which is frequented by Indians. We really like it because of the friendly service and excellent food. We had the lamb dish and a vegetable biryani. The meat dish was tasty and good spiced...More

review_data.title: NICE INDIAN RESTAURANT IN ZURICH
review_data.content: After a tiring day's road travel from Paris to Zurich, at the behest of our Tour Manager from Swiss Holidays we went to this Indian restaurant and had our dinner.We had tandoori and mughlai dishes like tadoori Roti,paneer butter masala,dal and chicken mughlai.And of course,the...More

review_data.title: Finally some good indian food in Zurich
review_data.content: We arrived on a Saturday evening at around 8.15 pm and were lucky to get the last table. Good and friendly service. We had to wait around 30 minutes for the food which was ok (the restaurant was full). We ordered Murgh Tikka Masala, Gosht...More

review_data.title: Expensive and looong wait
review_data.content: Ready to wait 90 minutes to get your chicken whatever-spice? Then this is the right place. Beside the wait there are several other things that can annoy the average Swiss person: ask for Hahnenwasser (tap water) and they simulate not to understand bringing their funny...More

review_data.title: Excellent Indian in Zurich
review_data.content: This is a great place to get an excellent Indian dinner when you are in Zurich. The location is convenient in the sense that it is within walking distance of the train station. The restaurant exterior was typically European and blended with the neighborhood. The...More

review_data.title: Gutes Essen im Schweizer Chic!
review_data.content: Ich mag das Essen im Vulkan. Ofenfrisches Nan, cremiges Raita, komplexe Currys und the all time Indien Klassiker die es...More

review_data.title: Good Indian food.
review_data.content: Tasty Indian food finallyin Zurich. Service is good. Those who are willing to have Indian food in Zurich , should visit here to get satisfaction.

review_data.title: THE Indian restaurant in Zurich
review_data.content: When living in Zurich we tried different indian restaurants, but Vulkan was the only one we visited more than once (surely about 8 times). Vulkan is (or maybe was) also the only one with an original tandoor oven in Zurich. The atmosphere is cozy and...More

review_data.title: soddisfatto
review_data.content: Ottimo, dall'ambiente, al personale ai piatti. Il cibo era favoloso soprattutto il butter chicken!!! grazie vulkan :)

review_data.title: High price, tiny portion

review_data.title: Not quite worth the name

review_data.title: Good Indian food in Zurich !
review_data.content: Food was really good as we really enjoy Indian food anywhere & everywhere. The overall experience in this restaurant has been a good experience for me & my family. Food was tasty, service was prompt & well aniticipated. Indeed - wonderful experience of Indian hospitality...More

review_data.title: Fantastic Food and great Service

review_data.title: My best meal in Zurich

review_data.title: would definately go back there

review_data.title: Excellent food but expensive
review_data.content: I had excellent food at this restaurant but it was very expensive. The service was very good but there is not separate section for smokers and non-smokers. This made me uncomfortable being a passive smoker while eating there. They must separate smokers from non-smokers.

review_data.title: Good food, attentive service, expensive
review_data.content: The Indian food served was appropriately spicy and delicious, but this is definitely the most expensive Indian food dining experience I've had, and I've eaten at many high end Indian restaurants in DC and NYC.
